mapper.insert: insert into reply(rpl_code, brd_code, rpl_content, mb_nick, mb_email, rpl_regdate) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{brd_code}, #{rpl_content}, #{mb_nick}, #{mb_email}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update reply set rpl_content = #{rpl_content} where rpl_code = #{rpl_code}
mapper.select: select rpl_code, brd_code, rpl_content, mb_nick, mb_email, rpl_regdate from reply where brd_code = #{brd_code} order by rpl_code asc
